Extra.RollInputHelp: Enter the roll input for the extra.

EnableStamina.Name: Enable Stamina
EnableStamina.Hint: If enabled, characters will have stamina added to their character sheet which auto decrements on a magic roll.

EnableExtrasRolling.Name: Enable Extras Rolling
EnableExtrasRolling.Hint: If enabled, extras can be configured with a roll field, and characters will have a button to roll extras.
